---
title: Ive had a food zine
categories: Discussion
tags: ['intended', 'finally', 'brewing', 'backburner']
author: Greg Soper
link: https://plus.google.com/110647526896176491992/posts/45jPeikLk5A
published: 2018-04-28T23:59:51.327Z
updated: 2018-04-28T23:59:51.327Z
imagelink: []
thumblinks: []
---

I&#39;ve had a food zine brewing (pun intended) on the backburner (also intended) for a good long while. The most recent Food focused episode of &quot;Play to Find Out&quot; (a great DW podcast) finally kicked my butt into action to finally turn it into a zine!<br /><br />So I&#39;d love to crowdsource some ideas! Please take a moment to fill out this survey (all questions are optional! Answer only what you feel like.)
<div id='comment z122vjgzqyiqtphkm23bsjw4nu2chzsjo04'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/110647526896176491992_photo.jpg'> Greg Soper</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-04-29 00:00:37 (edited: 2018-04-29 00:00:37)</cite></p>
        <p>If anyone remembers, a few months ago I posted about a new zine I was starting called Dungeon Rations. The first issue was to be about Stories, which I eventually figured out was perhaps too difficult to tackle in my first issue... (don&#39;t worry, it is still coming). I&#39;ve switched to food as an easier first subject!</p>
</div>
        

<div id='comment z122vjgzqyiqtphkm23bsjw4nu2chzsjo04'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/117938653641565340771_photo.jpg'> Logan Howard</h4>

</div>

<div id='comment z122vjgzqyiqtphkm23bsjw4nu2chzsjo04'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/117135021755805136927_photo.jpg'> Nick Nunes</h4>
      <p><cite>2018-04-30 00:49:35 (edited: 2018-04-30 00:49:35)</cite></p>
        <p>Excited to see the results of this. There&#39;s been a lot of buzz about food in RPGs lately, I think because of the manga Dungeon Meshi (&quot;Delicious in Dungeon&quot;). I&#39;ve got a half baked (pun intended) set of moves for implementing some of the unique aspects of Dungeon Meshi in DW.<br /><br />If you haven&#39;t seen them you might check out these:<br /><a href="https://www.occultesque.com/2017/07/eating-good-in-dungeonhood.html" data-embed="-hFDaHR0cHM6Ly93d3cub2NjdWx0ZXNxdWUuY29tLzIwMTcvMDcvZWF0aW5nLWdvb2QtaW4tZHVuZ2Vvbmhvb2QuaHRtbA" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://www.occultesque.com/2017/07/eating-good-in-dungeonhood.html</a><br /><br /><a href="https://coinsandscrolls.blogspot.com/2017/07/monster-menu-all-part-1-eating-ad.html" class="ot-anchor">https://coinsandscrolls.blogspot.com/2017/07/monster-menu-all-part-1-eating-ad.html</a><br /><br /><a href="https://coinsandscrolls.blogspot.com/2017/08/monster-menu-all-part-2-veins-of-earth.html" class="ot-anchor">https://coinsandscrolls.blogspot.com/2017/08/monster-menu-all-part-2-veins-of-earth.html</a></p>
</div>
